sentences.sContent: That was a stupid thing to say.
I can’t believe Kate was stupid enough to get involved in this.
sentences.sCn: 我简直不能相信凯特这么傻，会介入这件事情。

sentences.sContent: It was stupid of me to lose my temper.
sentences.sCn: 我大发脾气，真是太愚蠢了。

sentences.sContent: No, stupid, don’t do it like that!

trans.tranOther: showing a lack of good sense or good judgment
an insulting way of talking to someone who you think is being stupid
